Test Name: Streptococcus pneumoniae IgG Antibodies, Total, Serum
Purpose: To quantify total Streptococcus pneumoniae IgG antibodies in serum to evaluate immune status and protection against Streptococcus pneumoniae.
Container: Serum separator tube (SST) or red-top tube
Equipment: Immunoassay analyzer (e.g., ELISA reader), calibrated micropipettes, multichannel pipette, plate washer, incubator, laboratory timer
